Q_NAME: Deleting a node at given position-SLL
Q_DESC:
The node is deleted at given position P of the given Linked List. For example if the given Linked List is 5->10->15->20->25 and we delete at Position 3, then the Linked List becomes 5->10->20->25.
INPUT
First line contains the number of datas- N. Second line contains N integers(the given linked list).
Third line contains the position P where the node to be deleted.
OUTPUT
case 1(position P is Valid. i.e,0<P<N ) :
Display the final Linked List.
case 2(position P is Invalid) :
Print Invalid position!
Display the Linked list.
